mapper.insert: insert into users1 (id, userName, passWord, userSex, nickName, AgentDeadline, CreatedDatetime, UpdatedDatetime) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentdeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update users1 set userName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, passWord = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userSex = #{usersex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickName = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AgentDeadline = #{agentdeadline,jdbcType=DATE}, CreatedDatetime = #{createddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdatedDatetime = #{updateddatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, userName, passWord, userSex, nickName, AgentDeadline, CreatedDatetime, UpdatedDatetime from users1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, userName, passWord, userSex, nickName, AgentDeadline, CreatedDatetime, UpdatedDatetime from users1
